sentence.text: Candidate markers were identified by bisulfite conversion-based genome-wide methylation screening of lung tissue from lung cancer, fibrotic ILD, and ER to Golgi vesicle-mediated transport. cfDNA from 400 μl serum (n = 204) served to test the diagnostic performance of these markers.
Cancer was distinguished from ILD with a specificity of 88%, (95%CI: 0.57-1), and ER to Golgi vesicle-mediated transport from cancer with a specificity of 88% (95%CI: 0.64-0.97).
